title: Last of Us HBO Gets a Release date?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.22
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unnecessary subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Watch The Rings of Power on Prime Video and download the Amazon Music app to listen to all eight episodes of The Official The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Podcast for free on Amazon Music.

Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to start your credit journey with Chime.

HBO might've leaked the Last of Us release date, PS Plus has lost almost 2 millions subscribers, and we got a bunch more PlayStation sales figures. Greg and Blessing tackle it all!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:20:00 - Housekeeping
Merch of the month is LIVE! New bodega collection inspired by the neighborhood markets in the city! kindafunny.com/store
The first of four Kinda Funny Special Presentation videos from Barrett is coming out this Wednesday! Join him for a YouTube Premiere at 9am PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames as he tries to answer the question: Has Kratos truly changed over the course of the last 17 years?
Get your popcorn ready because the KFFL returns November 2nd at 11 am PT HERE on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and youtube.com/kindafunnygames. Coach Cortez and Dynamite Howard will be in the booth calling a double-header for your KF 49ers. We'll see you then, football fans.
